infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: ParkSpot needs access to your location to save where you parked your car.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: ParkSpot needs access to your camera to take photos of your parking spot.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: ParkSpot needs access to your photo library to select photos of your parking spot.
infoPlist.NSUserNotificationsUsageDescription: ParkSpot will send you notifications when your parking time is about to expire.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow ParkSpot to use your location to save where you parked your car.

plugins.cameraPermission: ParkSpot needs access to your camera to take photos of your parking spot.

plugins.photosPermission: ParkSpot needs access to your photos to select images of your parking spot.
